author: John
title: Typesetting Sha and Bitcoin
description: I went down a rabbit hole this week using two symbols in LaTeX. The first was the Russian letter Sha (Ш, U+0248), and the second was the currency symbol for Bitcoin (₿, U+20BF). Sha I thought there would be a LaTeX package that would include Ш as a symbol rat…
content:
I went down a rabbit hole this week using two symbols in LaTeX. The first was the Russian letter Sha (, U+0248), and the second was the currency symbol for Bitcoin (, U+20BF).
